name: Science, Technology, Business and/or Education Outreach
objective: To evaluate the benefits and impacts of NIST research and development efforts and/or evaluate and/or stimulate technological innovation in the private sector, strengthen the role of small businesses in meeting Federal research and development needs, and/or  increase private sector commercialization of innovations derived from NIST research and development efforts and/or NIST’s Small Business Innovation Research Program; also, to support innovative approaches and methods for science and/or technology education.
sub_agency_name: National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST)
applicant_types: Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)

authorizations.text: 15 U.S.C. § 272, National Institute of Standards and Technology Act, as amended.
15 U.S.C. § 638, Aid to Small Business, Research and Development.
